title: [FEATURE] Prebuilt ARM libraries for Alpine Linux
body:
### Is your feature request related to a problem?

Some Alpine Linux users would like to run [jellyfin](https://github.com/jellyfin/jellyfin) on ARM but it uses SkiaSharp and there's currently only x86_64 Alpine libraries provided.

### Describe the solution you would like

It would be great to have armv7 and arm64 Alpine prebuilt libraries added.

### Describe alternatives you have considered

There's [two unmaintained nuget packages](https://www.nuget.org/packages?q=SkiaSharp+Alpine).

### Additional context

_No response_

### Code of Conduct

- [X] I agree to follow this project's Code of Conduct
